question: Bob Behnken and Doug Hurley, who were in news recently, are associated with which field?
explanation:
The historic first manned space flight of SpaceX for NASA is scheduled to take off for the International Space Station on May 27. 
The mission is called Demo-2 and it will launch the two NASA astronauts Bob Behnken and Doug Hurley into orbit. The Crew Dragon spacecraft of SpaceX onboard a Falcon 9 rocket is used in this historic launch. Since 2011, NASA has sent all its astronauts through Russiaâ€™s Soyuz capsule.
